abstract.t: This document specifies a data model for managing Sieve scripts on a server using JMAP. Open Issues o How should doing /set{create} with an existing script name be handled? Should it fail or overwrite the existing script? Should the /set request include an 'overwrite' boolean argument? o Should setting isActive==true on a script automatically deactivate any other existing active script, or should the client have to do so itself (as is currently documented)? o Do we want/need a SieveScript/copy method? o Do we want to leverage draft-ietf-jmap-quotas to query Sieve script storage quotas?
